title: Tanzania Bank Lending Rate
description: Bank Lending Rate in Tanzania decreased to 13.92 percent in September from 14.24 percent in August of 2022. Bank Lending Rate in Tanzania averaged 13.06 percent from 2003 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 17.91 percent in September of 2017 and a record low of 7.53 percent in March of 2004. In Tanzania, the negotiated lending rate is an average rate of lending rates for prime customers. This page provides - Tanzania Bank Lending Rate- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Tanzania
